title: На все 100!
overview: Where in Rus' can you live well, and most importantly, for a long time?The main lover of life and optimist of the Russian scene, Mitya Fomin, goes on a fascinating journey around the country to find out how to live to 100.Eight episodes are eight regions of Russia with high life expectancy and bright heroes aged 80-90-100, who live a full life in different parts of our country, despite their golden age. They participate in competitions, set records, climb rocks, build cars, fall in love and have affairs.A doctor by education and a biohacker by life, Mitya knows exactly how to get the most out of life. But will he be able to give our heroes a head start in physical fitness, sense of humor and attitude to life?!?
